title: You can get $15 back with a $100 Apple gift card purchase today
content:
Macworld

Even if you’re not buying a new iPad or MacBook for Black Friday, you can always think about your next Apple purchase. And today you can get some extra money just by planning ahead: Amazon is giving away $15 credit when you spend $100 on Apple gift cards for Black Friday. Target and Best Buy are also running similar promotions with free $15 e-gift cards.

Apple gift cards can be used for anything Apple sells online or in stores, including Apple TV+ and Apple Music subscriptions, App Store downloads, and device purchases. And with the $15 gift card, you can buy whatever you want from Amazon or Target (or both). The offer is good for one purchase per customer. Target shoppers need to log into their Target Circle account to get the deal, while Amazon users can apply code APPLEGIFT. The Best Buy promotion has no specific terms.

According to Amazon, the promotional credit will be automatically applied to the Amazon.com account used to purchase the gift card within three days and must be used by January 31, 2025. The Target and Best Buy gift cards don’t appear to have an expiration date.
